member.name: T:WindowsApp3.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:WindowsApp3.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:WindowsApp3.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:WindowsApp3.frmSales
member.summary: Author: Nigel Mansell Date: 9/17/2017 This class uses two radio buttons, three checkboxes and three textboxes to calculate the cost of one to 100 software license.

member.name: M:WindowsApp3.frmSales.RadioButton1_CheckedChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This radio button is selected by default, when the other button is selected, this one is deselected.

member.name: M:WindowsApp3.frmSales.RadioButton2_CheckedChanged(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When this radio button is selected, the other is deselcted.

member.name: M:WindowsApp3.frmSales.Button1_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This button calculates based off which radio button is selected along with which checkboxes are selected and how many licenses the user enters. After calculations, and checking the email, displays back to the user.

member.name: M:WindowsApp3.frmSales.btnClear_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Clears out all the all checkboxes, textboxes, and the lable at the bottom, also makes use of a messagebox.

member.name: M:WindowsApp3.frmSales.btnClose_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Exits the program after making use of a messagebox.
